arts.ttl: AS Roma vs Hellas Verona – Predicted lineup and team news
arts.sum: AS Roma welcome Hellas Verona to the Stadio Olimpico for a crucial Serie A clash on Sunday. The Giallorossi will be aiming to maintain their top four push after a positive start under new manager Gian Piero Gasperini, while Verona are still in search of their opening win of the season. AS Roma vs Hellas […] The post AS Roma vs Hellas Verona – Predicted lineup and team news first appeared on The Football Faithful.
